answers.answer: With my daughter I only gained 12lbs I was under weight majority of my pregnancy.. I didn't gain weight till the last couple months
Each pregnancy is different- I've had 5 girls, some I gained a ton with and a few I didn't gain much- one I lost weight- my boys were both different too, so you just never know!

question: Is it normal to loose weight carrying a girl ? This is my second pregnancy and I've lost about 30 lbs in 15 weeks. With my son I gained around 70 lbs and I didn't have the pregnancy    Diabetes (I don't know the correct word for it )
title: Loosing weight
